name: Tentacle Burst
description: A bloated, pulsating mass of organic tissue covered in oily slime and pulsing veins, the Tentacle Burst resembles a grotesque jellyfish fused with an armored cockroach. From its back sprout dozens of razor-sharp tentacles that twitch constantly, seeking anything to latch onto.

flavor.rationale: The Tentacle Burst is the result of years of unchecked experimental waste being dumped into the sewers. A unique combination of chemicals, nanobots, and genetic material caused a single cockroach to rapidly mutate, evolving its tentacles and volatile compound-injecting capabilities as a defense mechanism against predators in the sewer environment.
